name: Dodgeball (itch) (nbondogji)
description:
Dodgeball is a 1-2 player game that is boy vs. girl. The game is to create fun, and challenge while beating your opponent.  This game offers a chance for the player to play by themselves or with Ai. 

Player Controls:
  • to navigate through menu use arrow keys and press enter
  • Boy Character use WASD to move SPACEBAR to shoot 
  • Girl Character use Arrow keys to move K to shoot 
How to Play:

Whoever hits their opponent with the dodgeball first three times wins! 

This game was designed by Justin Mata (the programer) and Noor Bondogji (the artist). Dodgeball was created with Unity. This is our game project for Art 108. We are still updating some things and will let you know when something new is up. 

For more information and questions please feel free to reach out to us in the comment box below!
